findings.title: Uninitialized Storage Pointer
findings.description: The storage pointer has not been initialized before use.

findings.title: Unprotected SELFDESTRUCT Instruction
findings.description: The SELFDESTRUCT instruction is used without any protection, which can lead to unintended contract destruction.

findings.title: Unprotected Ether Withdrawal
findings.description: The contract has an unprotected ether withdrawal functionality.

findings.title: Unchecked Call Return Value
findings.description: The return value of a call instruction is not checked.

findings.title: Function Default Visibility
findings.description: Functions with default visibility can lead to unintended access and manipulation of contract state.

findings.title: Owner can transfer ownership
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to transfer ownership.

findings.title: Owner can update minimum, maturity time, interest rate and penalty for staking
findings.description: The owner of the contract has the capability to update critical parameters such as minimum, maturity time, interest rate, and penalty for staking.

findings.title: Owner cannot renounce ownership
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to renounce their ownership.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint after initial deployment
findings.description: The owner of the contract loses the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Owner cannot burn
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to burn tokens or assets.

findings.title: Owner cannot block users
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to block users.

findings.title: Owner cannot pause contract
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the ability to pause the contract.
